messages.message:
Since GPT can output as a fixed width text table.  It would improve readability to be able to change the text box to fixed-width font. Iâ€™ve included a screenshot and what the table looks like with fixed width font.
```| Financial Highlights | Fiscal Year 2022 |
|----------------------|------------------|
| Gross Margins         | 64.3%, 64.0%, 62.5% |
| Company Name          | Cisco |
| Operating Cash Flows  | $13.2B (2022), $15.5B (2021), $15.4B (2020) |```
@Seth Agree that we should support monospaced fonts to make this more readable.
